item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m AJ, an IT professional in the Microsoft space for over ten years. I’m originally from South Shore region of Massachusetts, and currently reside in the Rochester, New York area. I mostly work with ConfigMgr, Intune, Active Directory, and Azure AD. I’m currently a ConfigMgr Customer Engineer for Microsoft as a vendor, and formally a systems administrator/engineer for a university. I’m also one of the admins of the WinAdmins Community on Discord.
